project.description: Checks if stop_master.sh and start_master.sh work properly.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
sudo /opt/vappio-scripts/vp-stop-node master
node=`cat /var/vappio/runtime/node_type` if [ "$node" != "OFFLINE" ]; then echo "node is $node" echo "error, node should be offline" exit 1 fi
sudo /opt/vappio-scripts/vp-start-node master
node2=`cat /var/vappio/runtime/node_type` if [ "$node2" != "master" ]; then echo "node is $node2" echo "error, node should be master" exit 1 fi
